title: cant buy champions out of ip
body:
im level 12 and saving my ip to get a champion. when ever i click to puchase it with ip (on any hero) it wont let me do it. all it says ERROR purchase cannot be completed at this moment. PLEASE HELP!!

CHEERS!!!

replies.body: Normally when something that sounds like what your describing happens to me, i just open up the main shop and wait for it to load and then buy the champion or whatever you want to buy
Sometimes happens to me too. Have you tried doing it again once you have originally purchased it?
